Shokaract: I'm going.

Shokaract said to Godfather. He changes into tank mo=
de and drives off to Triggerhappy's position...

  ----- Original Message -=
---- 
  From: Testifier: Abyssian Badass 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  S=
ent: Saturday, September 08, 2001 1:14 AM
  Subject: ATTN: Rdahl, Airly, an=
d maximals


  ::Triggerhappy/Skullgrin/Jume/Whee::

  "Okay, listen up.  W=
e're gonna need a diversion, to distract them a small
  bit.  Whee, Jume, a=
nd Skullgrin, you guys attack that area, and wait until
  they come out.  A=
ctually, Skullgrin, you attack that other area, so they
  have two areas to=
 deal with, that side and that side.  Then, Blindfear, I
  want you to atta=
ck the entrance.  Meanwhile, I'll be at the back, and I'll
  be calling in =
for reinforcements from the base!  And, just keep attacking
  until my word=
.  Oh, Skullgrin, Jume and Whee, when your attacking, slowly
  take your at=
tack to the entrance, so then you'll all be at the entrance
  attacking.  I=
t may seem like they outnumber you, but in fact, once the
  reinforcements =
arrive, we'll do fine.  Then, we must move our way inside the
  base!  Some=
 Decepticons will stay out here and battle these guys, and some
  others wi=
ll start rampaging inside.  Now, let's do it.  Wait till I get
  where I ne=
ed to be."

  Triggerhappy went behind the base.

  "Now!"  he said through=
 comm, "Blindfear, attack front, Jume, Whee and
  Skullgrin, attack the sid=
es!"

  Skullgrin nodded, and JUme and Whee did also.  Jume and Whee went t=
o their
  issued side, and Skullgrin went to his.  Skullgrin fired some sho=
ts at the
  base.  Jume and Whee also fired their weapons at it.  Triggerha=
ppy was ready
  to ask for reinforcements.  He decided to send a message to=
 the whole Dark
  Avian(technology, gotta love it!).

  "All Decepticons, I=
 repeat, all Decepticons!  We are carrying out
  infiltration of Maximal Ci=
ty!  The ones here right now are Skullgrin,
  Blindfear, Jume, and Whee!  I=
 request that reinforcements arrive at my
  location and attack as quick as=
 possible!!!!!  Over!" Triggerhappy said loud
  and clear.
  ----- Original=
 Message -----
  From: <airly2000@...>
  To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>=
